item.title: Why Professor Damodaran Says 'Timing the Market' Is a Losing Game
item.description: Investment guru Professor Aswath Damodaran warns that while the 2025 U.S. stock market is indeed overvalued, trying to time the market based on this fact is likely to fail. Historical data proves that market timing strategies underperform simple buy-and-hold, and when transaction costs and psychological traps are considered, the losses are even greater.
